title: Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate, 6/21/10 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 21, 2010

 



Presidential Nomination Sent to the Senate, 6/21/10




Michael S. Owen, of Virginia, a Career Member of the Senior Foreign Service, Class of Counselor, to be Extraordinary and Plenipotentiary of the United States of America to the Republic of Sierra Leone.
